chargeHist.descr: Identity Theft - Obtain Money or Credit
Identity Theft - Obtain Money or Credit

result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael M Kin was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Attempt Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: sentenced to jail

Defendant Michael M Kin in court, in custody, with attorney Jessica L. Rowe.   Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State makes sentencing arguments.  Defense makes sentencing arguments.  Court sentences defendant to the following:

COUNT 1:

4 months Jail consecutive (Credit - 64 days)

COUNT2:

4 months Jail consecutive

COUNT 3:  

30 days Huber, consecutive, with release for work or treatment.

After 6 month served, Court will allow for Huber with release for work or treatment.

Probation Revoked.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Michael M Kin in court with attorney Jonathan A. Lavoy.  Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Plea Colloquy.
Defendant enters a guilty plea to Counts 1, 2 and 3.  Court finds defendant guilty.

COUNT 1
The Court Orders the Following:

Withheld Sentence of:

Term of Probation: 2 Years

Conditions of Probation:
- AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended;
- Mental Health Evaluation and follow through with any treatment recommended;
- Absolute Sobriety; Random U.A.s;
- No Use or Possession of alcohol or illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia;
- No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
- Any valid prescription drugs must be taken in the manner in which they are prescribed;
- Inform agent of all prescriptions;
- Sign Medical Release for Agent;
- Perform  30 hours of community service each year of probation to be completed 1-15-17
- Maintain a valid driver's license;
- Operate a motor vehicle with a valid license;
- No contact with Zien Services, Keith S., Steve N., Grainger, and Gerald B.

Costs: $ 253.00
DNA Surcharge:  $200.00
DNA Sample waived

Condition Time: 10 days Huber NON WORKING HOURS WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS - Stayed and to be used at the agent's discretion.


COUNT 2

The Court Orders the Following:

Withheld Sentence

Term of Probation: 2 Years  Concurrent to Count 1

Conditions of Probation: Same as Count 1

Costs: $243.00 
DNA Surcharge:  $200.00
DNA Sample waived

Condition Time: 10 days Huber NON WORKING HOURS WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS - Stayed and to be used at the agent's discretion.  Consecutive to Count 1

COUNT 3
The Court Orders the Following:

Withheld Sentence

Term of Probation: 2 Years  Concurrent to Count 1

Conditions of Probation: Same as Count 1

Costs: $243.00 
DNA Surcharge:  $200.00
DNA Sample waived

Condition Time: 10 days Huber NON WORKING HOURS WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS - Stayed and to be used at the agent's discretion.  Consecutive to Count 2
